evidence.claim: Hitachi Healthcare uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure solutions.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations for healthcare data handling.
Integrates with EHR systems using HL7 and FHIR standards.
Utilizes Microsoft Azure for data processing and analytics in healthcare.
Employs X12 transaction sets in their medical billing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction usage or clearinghouse functionality found.
